message: Member name not following naming convention - Name 'BLOCKING_TIME' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.

Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mPointerMean' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mTouchMode' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mZoomTimeStamp' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
